title: Visual Bug Ezreal ad scale
body:
Is this a visual bug or allround bug? Scales (0)ad?
https://s4.postimg.org/ipx57tbod/ezbug.png[/IMG]

replies.body:
Yeah that's actually bugged, I just checked in-game. 

Head over and report it in the [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board. Make sure you read [this](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/3mQGBEjA-how-to-report-a-game-bug) before posting!
